nodes.text: Alderaanian diplomatic cruisers, also known simply as Alderaanian cruisers, Alderaanian starships, or Alderaan cruisers, were corvettes manufactured by the Corellian Engineering Corporation and used as diplomatic cruisers by the Royal House of Alderaan. Models included the streamlined CR70 corvette and more rugged, war-ready CR90 corvette, both of which were fast enough to serve as blockade runners.
